content: continue in the established stripe pattern cutting cc2 when appropriate in each round while working the gusset increases on needle work chart a sts 1-8 a total of 7 8 9 times 1 first sock or needle 2 second sock as and then work sts 9-16 once follows switch back to smaller needles *knit 2 rnds round 1 knit with mc and 2 rnds with cc1* repeat * - * round 2 k1 m1l knit until 1 st remains m1r until foot measures approximately 8 8 5 10 k1 cm / 3⅛ 3⅜ 4 inches less than the desired final length finishing with a cc1 cc1 mc repeat rnds 1 and 2 on needle 1 first sock or stripe needle 2 second sock and knit the sts on needle 2 first sock or needle 1 second sock until you have increased a total of 8 8 10 sts chart a and you have just finished rnd2 with cc1 there are now 40 44 50 sts on needle 1 first sock or needle 2 second sock chart key anna m socks page 2/4 heel knit 1 round with mc for the second sock only knit to the end of needle 1 work the first mc heel turn section back and forth on needle 1 for the first sock and on needle 2 for the second sock starting on rs as follows row 1 rs k39 k43 k49 w&t row 2 ws p38 p42 p48 w&t row 3 rs knit until 2 sts remain before the previous rs wrapped st w&t row 4 ws purl until 2 sts remain before the previous ws wrapped st w&t repeat rnds 3 and 4 until there are 6 7 8 wrapped stitches on each side of the heel turn one unwrapped stitch between each wrapped stitch and 18 18 20 unwrapped sts in the centre continue working in the round on the rs as follows knit to the end of the round knitting mini gusset decreases wraps together with the wrapped stitches continue in stripe pattern starting with a mc knit 2 rnds with cc1 then knit 1 round with stripe and work the gusset decreases on mc and finally for the second sock only knit needle 1 first sock or needle 2 second sock to the end of needle 1 as follows work the second mc heel turn section with round 1 knit short row as described for the first section round 2 ssk knit until 2 sts remains k2tog next knit 2 rnds with cc1 then knit 1 round repeat rnds 1 and 2 on needle 1 first sock or with mc and finally for the second sock only needle 2 second sock and knit the sts on knit to the end of needle 1 needle 2 first sock or needle 1 second sock work the third mc heel turn section with until 32 36 40 sts remain on each needle short row as described for the first section finally knit 2 rnds
